demo.description: This is a screensaver that gamifies your wallet assets into an RPG! We hope you can view token investments and value changes from a more relaxed perspective.
demo.companion: Every token can be your companion, accompanying you through the ups and downs of the market.
demo.upAction: When tokens go up, your companion will happily dance and celebrate!
demo.downAction: When tokens go down, your companion will work hard doing sit-ups...
demo.stableAction: When prices are stable, your companion will leisurely stroll around the farm.
demo.levelUp: The longer you hold tokens, the higher their level will be. In the future, you can even change their outfits!
